snippet: “You & Me,” Padgett Powell’s sendup of Beckett’s “Waiting for Godot,” is a slim novel in which two men sit around drinking and talking about everything and about nothing.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book You & Me by Padgett Powell.
lead_paragraph: “You & Me,” Padgett Powell’s sendup of Beckett’s “Waiting for Godot,” is a slim novel in which two men sit around drinking and talking about everything and about nothing.

headline.main: Game of Questions and, With Luck, Answers
headline.print_headline: Game of Questions and, With Luck, Answers
